The history of the province started in 1868 and ended in 1872. ==History== During the Edo period and early Meiji period, the Satake clan were daimyo in the area.Papinot, Edmund. (2003). Nobiliare du Japon -- Satake, pp. 53 [PDF 57 of 80;] Papinot, Jacques Edmond Joseph. (1906). Dictionnaire d’histoire et de géographie du Japon; retrieved 2012-11-8. In the Meiji period, the provinces of Japan were converted into prefectures.
